title: Rengar or Ekko?
body:
I know, two different laners and play styles... But they both sound so fun :D 

Main things I'm looking for in the champ -
Fun play style 
Helpful (team fighting etc...)
Power
Level or difficulty (don't really mind if high IF IT PAYS OFF!) 

Thoughts? 

Thanks

replies.body: they both got killed, but ekko probs contributes more with his w, he is also fun to play, especially if he gets ahead, just roam and use e to take kills, team will hate you, but you get to the "state of fun" a lot faster
What about Aatrox? Is he as good as them?
he is only good if he is fed and tanky, otherwise he is more of a supp/bruiser (just applies cc and some damage) with decent sustain, tho, if you get sated dev on him his sustain practically doubles.
Ekko is also really good at jungling right now. You could run him Runeglaive or Cinderhulk
Rengar gets boring he just dies after he combos to 1shot someone hes not carry material
rengar is probably more fun and not bad at team fighting
